item.description:
This is the last meetup I will be able to schedule before I go away for the summer :'-(

Please join the Newcomers for wine, beer, spirits, and/or food at the recently-opened cozy English Cellar Alehouse (this is where the old Liquid Lounge used to be). I will try to get the room in the back where the pool table is, but we shall see!

Everyone is welcome, whether you are a new or old member.

For more information about the bar: http://www.englishcel...
item.how_to_find_us: it's a small place... look for the group or msg me for my cell
item.name: Drinks @ English Cellar Alehouse
